articles.title: Why fossil fuel companies see green in Bitcoin mining projects
articles.description: ExxonMobil and other fossil fuel companies have turned to Bitcoin mining to address a gas problem. But their plans come with risks.
articles.content:
A Bitcoin mining site powered by otherwise lost gas from an oil well near Linden, Texas, on April 4th, 2022. | Photo by FRANCOIS PICARD/AFP via Getty Images
